sentence: The pool area was nice but you had to hurry and shotgun a seat with your towel to get a good one in the sun even though there were sings saying not to do that
The adult pool swim up bar was in a separate area where the childrens water slide was which did not make much sense to me
The costs were ridiculous 25 for a hamburger and Diet Coke at the pool
If I want to get picky the pools are quite shallow

Before we left the next day we had a very nice breakfast in the restaurant near the pool A bit pricey but the setting was worth the few extra dolarsThe hotel is less than 15 minutes from the airport and about the same to OSJ pier
Besides the two pools water slide Jacuzi and beach there is a casino attached to the building

Two pools were unheated small and hotel allowed people to put towels on chairs at 8 am and effectively hold the chairs all day leaving nowhere to sit or put your personal items if visiting the pool after 8 am
Much younger lively crowdDrinks by the pool were weak and expensive No entertainment on site
The one downside of our week is that the sea was too rough for swimming
Got to swim in a few waterfalls and see some petroglyphs it was worth the experience
We and the other rooms of people we were with all went to the pool bar
Hotel has casino pool beach area and so much more
I wanted to get some sun and swim in the Caribbean with minimal travel from Boston and used the Mariot like a beach resort
Specifically O’Neil at the back pool bar
We spent time at the restaurant pool and spa
We were staying at the sister hotel a couple of blocks away AC Mariot and had access to the beach and pool facilities as a result
Most notably we were treated like royalty at the pool
Hotel service was very good but the pool bar and lobby restaurant are mediocre with very high prices
Jackie Alejandra and Paola all gave excellent polside service
Beach access a pool with a water slide
I booked this hotel and arrived late at night only to find out they are under construction in the pool and beach side restaurant
The pool is great but the beach was poor
We did not play at the casino and did not use the pool sorry Mariot
Polside there were activities and even a large water slide for kids of all ages
We arrived and the main pool water slide were boarded off the beach bar and restaurant were closed
Part of area kids pool and outside dining areas under construction remodel everything else was great
but great pools although closed during the Reconstruction
We spent the majority of our time in the pool because my youngest loved it and would have stayed in all day if he could
There is construction around the main pool with jackhammers in play
Pool was under partial construction but that did not take away from our great experience
My husband had to wake up early to reserve chairs around the pool
One pool has a slide and that same pool has a swim up bar
he is a strong swimmer and I watched him scream and almost drown before I was able to push him onto a boulder
The one and only restaurant that serves outside and inside by pool is in need of much help
No problems getting a beach chair or umbrella or even a seat by the pool though we stayed over Thanksgiving weekend

Something I ’ve never seen before there ’s a “ dispenser ” outside to get your beach pool towels You have to swipe your key card to open the box to get the towels if you do n’t put them back in the bin afterwards you will be charged for the towels
Families that want pool and beach consider the mariot
There was a balcony overlooking the pool with a couple of chairs
